entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 10 except near minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 10 except near minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
